QuestData.Title: The Dead of Night
QuestData.Description:
This is the crux of the Dark Lady's plan for Darkshore. We will raise new champions for the Forsaken and the Horde on this very spot.
Guard the val'kyr. We cannot allow anything or anyone to interrupt them.
QuestData.LogDescription: Protect the val'kyr as they resurrect Delaryn and Sira.
